en.title: Congratulations Ginebra Kings for Winning Philippine's Fiesta Cup 2008! ! FusionExcel is So Proud of You!
en.content:
Allan Caidic and Samboy Lim Posing with the Fiesta CUP!
Genebra Kings Posing with the Fiesta Cup!
PBA Broke a New Box Office Record With Attendance of 22,000 and Viewed by Millions on Live TV!
Read Amazing Story Of Philippine Basketball Association. Team, Ginebra Kings!
Samboy Lim (Current Team Manager of the Ginebra Kings) and Allan Caidic (Ginebra Kings Coach) were first introduced to FusionExcel’s Quantum Science products in March 2008 by FusionExcel’s Philippines Country Licensee Jeremy Looi. At that time Ginebra was the underdog, with a win-loss record of 0-5. It’s not possible to have a worse start in the season than losing the first five games! Ginebra seemed to have no chance at the Fiesta Cup, up until they tried FusionExcel's Quantum products.
Coach Allan and FusionExcel Country Licensee Jeremy Looi conducted the standard demonstrations of FusionExcel’s Quantum Science products with all the team members. They couldn't believe it at first, until experiencing first hand the amazing increase in strength, stamina and flexibility!
Alex Crisano’s (Ginebra’s Biggest Team Member) eyes popped when he was lifted off using mere fingers thanks to FusionExcel’s Quantum Pendant.
Ginebra King’s usage of FusionExcel’s Quantum Science products in every game and practice session tremendously helped them step up their game to a whole new level.
The consistent success of Ginebra firmly entrenched their belief in FusionExcel’s products. Hence they insisted on nothing but FusionExcel’s products to replenish their energy.
Every team member is seen using FusionExcel’s Quantum Flask at every opportunity.
In every game, Samboy and Allan can be seen using FusionExcel's product.
Basketball is the most popular sport in the Philippines and the Philippine Basketball Association (PBA) has a legion of fans with millions tuning in to the TV with every game. FusionExcel’s products can be seen used in every Ginebra Kings game.
With the game on the line, Jay Jay Helterbrand (The Top Point Guard in the League) makes a quick "pit-stop" for a drink from the Quantum Flask to energise and rejuvenate.
Shooting guard Mark "the Spark" Caguioa (Conference Player of the Year) using FusionExcel’s Quantum Flask. Seated behind him is Gomer Go - Ginebra King’s physical therapist and FusionExcel’s new Director in the Philippines.

The Ginebra Kings rose slowly but surely from the bottom most-rung and ended the regular season with third placing.
Photo shows Ginebra Kings playing against the notoriously rough-playing Red Bulls in the semi finals. Ginebra had lost twice to the Red Bulls in the regular season. The Red Bulls were second place in the league when the playoffs began. Before a sell-out crowd, Ginebra again rose to the occasion and trashed the Red Bulls twice convincingly with a win of 111 over 104...
… and 108 over 82! Since these matches, the Ginebra Kings have beaten the Red Bulls for a third and fourth consecutive time in this playoff semi final series of the PBA, winning them a place in the FINALS!

This gives Ginebra its first series sweep in franchise history, its 17th finals appearance, and the first sweep in league history in 16 years (the last was in 1992 Third Conference when Swift swept 7-Up in the finals). The Game 4 victory extended Ginebra’s winning streak dating back from the eliminations to 12 (the longest in franchise history and the PBA for 12 years).

Now the Ginebra Kings are on a roll, and HAVE NOT lost in the last 12 games since using Fusion Excel’s Quantum Science products.

FusionExcel wishes the Ginebra Kings continued success, and hopes they make it all the way to win the 2008 Fiesta Cup!

meta.description:
FE's seminar with renowned scientist Dr Masaru Emoto "Scalar Energy Live Water" was well attended by 2,000 participants at PGRM Hall, Cheras on 13th December 2008. The guest speakers include FE's Medical Consultants, Dr Siva ("Why Do We Need Scalar Energized Water?") and Dr Amir Farid ("Water For Life") . The seminar was very informative and educational to the attendees who can now spread the good news about FE's Quantum Science products to the rest of the world!
After the seminar, Presidential Director KC Phoon did demos on the stage with 10 international beauty queens who are participating in the 12th Miss Tourism International 2008 World Finals held in KL on 31st December 2008. FE is a Gold Sponsor of the 12th Miss Tourism International 2008 World Finals. There was also a photograph session with the beauty queens and FE members at the end of the seminar.
Dr Masaru Emoto's KL seminar is the 3rd leg of a 4-country roadshow organised exclusively by FE which covers Philippines, Thailand, Malaysia and Indonesia.
meta.keyword: Congratulations Ginebra Kings for Winning Philippine's Fiesta Cup 2008! ! FusionExcel is So Proud of You!
meta.author: klhunter
